name: MoBot
author: sieadev@example.com
description: Creates a container that runs MoBot.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# MoBot Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
PROJECT=mobot

apt update
apt install -y curl jq

cd /mnt/server

# Download the latest release of MoBot
LATEST_RELEASE=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/Pixel-Services/MoBot/releases/latest | jq -r '.assets[0].browser_download_url')
curl -L $LATEST_RELEASE -o mobot.jar
